text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
The days go by as we continue our community service together. 
Today, we have a special task lined up…

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child A
text_block_list.text: Whoa, awesome! I know you! You're really good at running!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ohh, you know me? Uhh… Thank you?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child B
text_block_list.text: Wow, your hair is so soft! You're even cuter than you look on TV!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huh?! I-I'm cute?!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child B
text_block_list.text: Super cute! I looove you!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Er, um… You really shouldn't use that word so lightly… Hey, 
Tannhauser! Help me—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Her tail is so fluffy and soft, right? And just look at those cute little 
ears!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: No, don't encourage them! Ugh, why meee?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child B
text_block_list.text: Hey, Nature! Sing something for us! We wanna hear a cute song!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Sing?! Come on, cut me some slack!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
All right, everyone! Today, we're going to teach you little ones a few 
things about how we big Umamusume run!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Children
text_block_list.text: Okaaay!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Pant… Wheeze… Nope, I can't do it anymore… Their innocence really hits you in the heart in more ways than one…

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: We're not even that much older, Nature. You're so overdramatic.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Oh? Hi there. Why don't you come over here and play with us?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child C
text_block_list.text: …I know you. At the race before, you caught a cold and couldn't run!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh?!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child C
text_block_list.text:
My mommy said you always finish in a good position. But isn't a "good 
position" usually first place?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Urgh! Augh… Oof… I tumble.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Yep, there's that pure, unfiltered innocence for you. You're gonna 
need a picker-upper after that blow. I'll buy you a soda on the way 
back.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Okay, everyone—this way please! You're getting a real training 
session today!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Children
text_block_list.text: Aye aye, boss!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: How'd she get them so organized? Meanwhile in this corner…

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child C
text_block_list.text:
So I was thinking. If you just zoom to the front near the end of the 
race, you'll win for sure!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mhm, I see. Yeah, that's an interesting idea. Thanks for the advice.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Getting schooled by a little kid… You're just gonna let that happen, 
Tannhauser?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. As long as everyone's having fun. Hm? Tannhauser, those notes 
in your journal…

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child C
text_block_list.text:
Also, don't you know you get jinxed if you eat curry before a race? 
You won't be able to run your best.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Jinxed?! Wait, you have to tell me more! How can I break the jinx?!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Wait, you too now?! Am I the only one thinking straight today?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
All right! Looks like all the kids have gone home! Shall we pack up? 
…Oh?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's you… Hehe. If you keep hanging on to me like that, I won't be 
able to go back to my school.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child C
text_block_list.text:
Try not to catch any more colds, okay? I'm rooting for you! I wanna 
see you win!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yup, got it. I'm going to win! It's a promise!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mu-muuun! BRING IT OOOOON!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Uh… Why the sudden outburst?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm gonna do my best! I have to look cool for that kid!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
What's the big rush? I thought you did pretty good in the welcome 
race. Better than me, at any rate…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: What? You two were in the race?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser and Nature
text_block_list.text: Of course we were!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Oh, Kita… You should know better…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
I'm really, really sorry! I was just so focused on Teio, I guess I didn't 
see anyone else!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
…Sure, I mean… who can blame you? None of us can compare to a 
dazzling protagonist like Teio…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
She makes winning look easy, then goes the extra mile on top of that. 
Next to her, we're just your one-off support characters there to spice 
up the action.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: That's not true…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Nah, I'm serious. Teio's the real deal. No one racks up the wins like 
her.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Even so, I want to aim for the top! I'll run with all my might and get 
stronger… and become someone people can look up to!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: You said it, Kita. I'm going to get stronger too—just like McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Oh, to be so young and full of aspirations. Wonder if I was like that 
when I first enrolled…
